choose.when: delete from bookmark where itemNo = #{itemNo } and usersNo = #{userNo }
delete from bookmark where usersNo = #{userNo } and shopNo = #{shopNo }
select no from bookmark where usersNo = #{userNo } and itemNo = #{itemNo }
select no from bookmark where usersNo = #{userNo } and shopNo = #{shopNo }

mapper.select: select b.*, i.name iname, i.picture ipicture, s.name sname, s.picture spicture from bookmark b left outer join item i on b.itemNo = i.no left outer join shop s on b.shopNo = s.no where b.usersNo = #{userNo } order by no desc
